document_data.name: Borenorak
document_data.mainbody: '''Borenorak''' was a treasure hunter and [[cleric]] of [[Icewind Dale]] in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He may have joined the companions in their journey to [[Menzoberranzan]].
document_data.History: He could be found by adventurers deep in the underground tunnels of the plains of Icewind Dale, looting the area for [[silver]] and rare [[gem]]s. Borenorak was once controlled by an [[aboleth]], and thus suffered from "Aboleth disease". This caused his skin to become marked by conspicuous veins.
